00041     void SDLWindow::create(String name, int width, int height, int colourDepth,
00042                            bool fullScreen, int left, int top, bool depthBuffer,
00043                            void* miscParam, ...)
00044     {
00045         fprintf(stderr, "SDLWindow::create\n");
00046         SDL_Surface* screen;
00047         int flags = SDL_OPENGL | SDL_GL_DOUBLEBUFFER | SDL_HWPALETTE;
00048 
00049         SDL_GL_SetAttribute( SDL_GL_DOUBLEBUFFER, 1 );
00050 
00051         if (fullScreen)
00052             flags |= SDL_FULLSCREEN;
00053 
00054         fprintf(stderr, "Create window\n");
00055         screen = SDL_SetVideoMode(width, height, colourDepth, flags);
00056         if (!screen)
00057         {
00058             fprintf(stderr, "Could not make screen\n");
00059             exit(1);
00060         }
00061         fprintf(stderr, "screen is valid\n");
00062         mScreen = screen;
00063 
00064         mWidth = width;
00065         mHeight = height;
00066 
00067         mActive = true;
00068 
00069         SDL_WM_SetCaption("OGRE Render Window", 0);
00070 
00071     }
00072 
00073     void SDLWindow::destroy(void)
00074     {
00075         SDL_FreeSurface(mScreen);
00076         mScreen = NULL;
00077     }
